src_original: Vin_2.436 / tatpratibaddhasya ca cīvarasya /  Vin_2.437 / aviśiṣṭatvam āmarṣayāmarśālambhagrahaṇākarṣaparika[12a4]rṣolliṃgāv aliṅgābhinipīḍānām /  Vin_2.438 / sevyakṛtvasya ca /  Vin_2.440 / ananyatvaṃ duṣkṛtahrāsasya /

Vin_2.441 / na bhikṣuṇī spṛśeta /  Vin_2.442 / na striyaṃ /  Vin_2.443 / spṛśed aṃbhasyārtām uttāraṇāya bāhau keśeṣu vā mātṛduhitṛbhaginīsaṃjñām upasthāpya /  Vin_2.444 / vālukāsthāne ceṣṭālābhārtham avāṅmukhāvasthāpanaṃ /  Vin_2.445 / pīṭhavat* rakṣaṇaṃ /
Vin_2.446 / bhaktāyāvalokya go[12a5]pālapaśupālakāna gamanam* /  Vin_2.447 / pratyavekṣaṇaṃ jīvati na veti paunaḥpunyena /  Vin_2.448 / nirdoṣo nukampayā śuddhacittasya stripariṣvaṅgaḥ /
(kha) pṛcchāgatam /  Vin_2.449 / ślakṣṇoṣṇamṛdukābhiprāyatve sthūlaṃ* /  Vin_2.450 / anāpattir anukampayā duḥkhāta mocane /
Vin_12.19 / anyasya cāparādhasya /  Vin_12.20 / nāparādhyatā sabrahmacāriṣu /
Vin_12.21 / [57a5] vratasya niḥsāraḥ pravartito bhavatīti manasikaraṇaṃ /
Vin_12.33 / kṛte bhaktakṛtye śayanāsanasya channe gopanam* /
Vin_12.39 / na ced anyasya bhikṣor adhyeṣaṇaṃ /

Vin_12.42 / vihāre 'sya pratyante rhatvaṃ /  Vin_12.43 / arhatvaṃ sarvatra lābhe /  Vin_12.44 / pratijāgriyāt kuśalapakṣe /  Vin_12.45 / tadvad atra tatprabhāvaiṣīyaśikṣādattakau /  [R om.] / naivoddeśaḥ /
/ arūḍair aprakṛtistheṣu paripāsamānāpy aśikṣācaraṇānāṃ / [end of R om.]  Vin_12.46 / asaṃghe ca /
